feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 PM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 12:30 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: NW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 March 2023
